data.name: Love Season - Winter
data.detailed_description:
The winter has come to Love Season!

This DLC adds more content to chapter 6 - enough to be considered a whole new chapter on it's own! It's 131 new CGs, 4 sex scenes and more story development. The Winter story happens before the end of Chapter 6, just after the scene with Vivian (and Evelyn) at the pub.


Love Season - Winter chapter is about a day in their world very similar to our Christmas, when you can exchange gifts with your friends with a twist - receiving a gift and not giving anything back can result in several years of bad luck, meaning some characters will have to improvise their gifts if they didn't prepare enough...
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Celebrate the Gift Day with your beautiful girlfriends - a new Love Season chapter full of sexy content!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: !!This DLC contain scenes involving explicit sexual acts!!
